info.name: Dark-WhatsApp by Vednoc
info.description: Complete, dark and light, very customizable userstyle for WhatsApp. In very active development on GitHub, check the page to get involved.
info.additionalInfo: Very important! Please read: Updated on 21st of November. Before you write a bad review, make sure that you have the latest version (by clicking on update button to manually update it) or check out recent issues on GitHub. I have no power over what gets broken, but I do fix the issues very quickly. Changelog available at Github. If you really like the project and would like to tip me for my work, then you can buy me a coffee over at ko-fi or support me over at LiberaPay. I can't log into USo forum to reply to comments, but I do read them. Report issues on GitHub, my email, or my Discord. Sorry for the inconvenience, there's really not much I can do.

settings.label: Would you like to customize settings? Install the UserCSS version of this theme from GitHub.
